text: Hi! Can I work on Custom Code blocks of Workflows in my local development? Because I have a Sandbox and a production env and it's brittle to keep two portals aligned

Does anyone know how to get the following in html+hubl and css+hubl files, as i’m missing these default features, slowing down my workflow
• Auto closing of html tags
• tag/css rule suggestions when you type
• those color blocks in front of hex codes in css
• prettify for hubl actually working, never got it to work myself
Many thanks

Hey, hello guys, is there a way, a thing like a variable or anything, that i can use to choose the language that users gets the 1st time they open my website? I have English and spanish setted and there is a toggle button and everything but I want people on USA see English the firts time they open in and Spanish the other users like for example in Mexico or something
is there a tutorial that shows how to create a dynamic page using hubdb?

Is there a way to lift the requirement of having coded files smaller than 1.5 MiB? Using the react starter boiler plate.
`[HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin] line 0: Coded files must be smaller than 1.5 MiB`
